org.dexss.filters

Class BodyContentsFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.XMLFilterImpl
      • org.dexss.filters.DeXSSFilterImpl
        • org.dexss.filters.BodyContentsFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler, org.xml.sax.XMLFilter, org.xml.sax.XMLReader

    public class BodyContentsFilter
extends DeXSSFilterImpl
    Body Contents Filter; drops everything that's not in <body>

    When used with TagSoup, will drop elements such as <style> that should be in <head> but are written in <body>.
